Title: Terracotta Handmade
SubTitle: Sharmadha Crafts
Description: Seeds of compassion ‘RUDRAKSHA’ = Rudra+Aksha, meaning “Tear Drops of Lord Shiva”. Rudraksha worshipped as a source of good luck, good health, prosperity, medical values, success, financial gains and for eradication of evil forces. We are presenting those compassionate seeds in an ingenious manner.Only a single piece per item is available. We also provide modification based on availabilty of raw materials.
